item.title: About
item.description:
I’m a computer science student at the University of Toronto currently pursuing a “Specialist in Software Engineering”. I enjoy writing high-quality software, and I dabble in open-source.

A few details about myself:

  • I am Canadian

  • My favourite programming languages are go, ruby, and elixir (in that order)

  • I enjoy working on difficult problems

  • I write and maintain a few open-source projects

  • My favourite food is fried rice
